entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx-rc2` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #43563
  • dotnet8 <AnalysisLevel> linux #43538
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With NET9 RC2 SDK installed, some strings are unlocalized in output of "dotnet workload --info". #43533
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With NET9 RC2 SDK installed, some strings are unlocalized in output of "dotnet workload search --help". #43528
  • [Epic] Various quality of life issues when running a hackathon experiment #43526

Closed

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx-rc2` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #43561
  • `dotnet workload install` in userlocal mode fails with source-build .NET 9 Preview 5 #41726
  • Self-contained publish regression in .NET 9 RC1 #43461
  • [NETSDKE2E]With 8.0.402 SDK zip installed, Warning: "Workload garbage collection failed with error: Workload version 8.0.402-baseline.24467.1 was not found.." happens when installing maui workload. #43537

PullRequests

Created

  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #43560
    Servicing-consider
  • Add runtimeconfig option for DataSet XML serialization #43556
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix SelfContained build/publish when FrameworkReference with profile is combined with FrameworkReference without profile #43555
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix parsing of ports that lack port type metadata #43551
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Merged PR 43013: Subtracting 2 for the web template since September w… #43562
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Aspire service tests #43515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix SelfContained build/publish when FrameworkReference with profile is combined with FrameworkReference without profile #43527
    Servicing-approved, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43550
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43516
    Servicing-approved, Area-Tools
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43441
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Correctly handle different architectures for devdeviceID #43471
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Correctly handle different architectures for devdeviceID #43521
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • Port to 9.0.1xx: Fix processing non-public classes and generic types in AssemblyScheduler.cs (#43377) #43534
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • use prerelease version iteration 1 #43513
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Fix legacy package definitions design time builds #43496
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Patch for Source-Build Stage 2 FSharp FS0064 Warnings #43548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish prebuilt reports for each repo #43336
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-SourceBuild
  • Do not sync `internal/release/8.0.402` into VMR #43539
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43481
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions for October #43522
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Hot Reload: Handle file deletions correctly #43368
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2541836 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43157
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add an implicit reference to the Generate SBOM task #43151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Unstable branding with rtm label and empty iteration #43483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43440
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, Branch Lockdown
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: also try Basic auth when username is '<token>'. #43354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
